Question
========

A researcher examines whether a new form of therapy helps to treat social anxiety. In which of the following cases is regression to the mean a possible problem in interpreting results from the longitudinal intervention study?

Answerlist
----------

* When there are strong individual differences in the level of social anxiety.
* When placebo effects reduce social anxiety.
* When there are changes over time in social anxiety.

Solution
========

Answerlist
----------

* When strong individual differences exist in the degree of social anxiety...: Incorrect
* When placebo effects reduce social anxiety: Incorrect
* When there are changes over time in social anxiety: Correct
